author: ashish-a-turing
ashish-a-turing
description: Develop a secure AWS infrastructure for a web application with comprehensive security features including IAM roles, encrypted S3, VPC with bastion host, Lambda processing, CloudWatch monitoring, TLS certificates, and detailed tagging.
constraints: All infrastructure must be defined in Pulumi Go
Use IAM roles and policies to enforce least privilege access
Ensure all data at rest is encrypted using AWS KMS
Implement VPC with at least 2 public and 2 private subnets across two availability zones
Use AWS Lambda functions to process data from S3 with strict timeout and memory settings
All Lambda functions must use environment variables to pass sensitive data securely
Enable versioning for all S3 buckets used
Set up CloudWatch alarms for any unauthorized access attempts or resource usage spikes
Ensure all communications are over HTTPS using ACM for TLS certificates
Apply security groups that deny all inbound traffic except from specific IP ranges
Include detailed tagging for all resources to assist in cost tracking and management
